text:
"Funeral Frustrations"

Katerina Ivanovna's tense gathering, guests murmuring.  
“Why didn’t she come? So rude!”  
“Such a conceited baggage, really!”  
“Where's Sonia? She’s late again!”  

---  

Sonia arrives, looking anxious.  
“Sorry, I was... caught up.”  
“Pyotr Petrovitch sends his apologies.”  
“He’ll be here to discuss business.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna expresses frustration over the guests at her husband's funeral and is concerned about the absence of certain individuals.
